caption.p: Electrochemical performance of the silicon electrodes using PAU- g-PEG, PAA- g-PEG and PAA as the polymeric binder: ( a) rate performance at various current densities (@ 0.1–3 C), and ( b) cycling performance (@ 0.5 C) of Si@PAU- g-PEG electrode having different mass loadings (0.5–1.0 mg cm −2).
